quote: All the time, circumstances are not going to favor us. We shall have toface obstacles and adversities. Fearlessness is the first virtue of a hero, thestarting point of all other noble virtues.
quote_letters: ALL THE TIME CIRCUMSTANCES ARE NOT GOING TO FAVOR US WE SHALL HAVE TOFACE OBSTACLES AND ADVERSITIES FEARLESSNESS IS THE FIRST VIRTUE OF A HERO THESTARTING POINT OF ALL OTHER NOBLE VIRTUES
